data.title: Summit Construction
data.meta_description: Summit Construction Company (SCC) is a commercial construction management firm serving Northeast Ohio and Columbus markets. SCC provides commercial construction management services for clients in healthcare, education, hospitality/multi-family, retail/office, industrial/manufacturing, horticulture/greenhouses, restoration and adaptive reuse, and public/civic sectors.
data.text:
Summit Construction Company (SCC) is a commercial construction management firm serving Northeast Ohio and Columbus markets. SCC provides commercial construction management services for clients in healthcare, education, hospitality/multi-family, retail/office, industrial/manufacturing, horticulture/greenhouses, restoration and adaptive reuse, and public/civic sectors.

Mission

To provide an excellent construction experience while making a positive impact on communities.

Summit Construction believes every project is an opportunity to make an impact. Our team provides professional, enjoyable experiences and brings good to the communities we serve. We are passionate about giving back through volunteering, mentorship, and our student learning program.

Vision

Build lasting relationships through construction.

Summit Construction is qualified to complete your project and invested in your organizationâ€™s future success. We prioritize building strong, lasting relationships and the people behind the project.

Values

We are firm but fair.

We are accountable.

We seek continuous improvement.

We are team oriented.

Construction physically empowers and improves lives. Lives of students, patients, residents, guests, customers, and workers. Bettering the lives of others drives our business.
